quote: Baldrick, does it have to be this way? Our valued friendship ending with me cutting you up into strips and telling the prince that you walked over a very sharp cattle grid in an extremely heavy hat?
episode: Blackadder Series 3 Episode 6 Duel and Duality

quote: Your brain, for example, is so minute, Baldrick, that if a hungry cannibal cracked your head open, there wouldn't be enough to cover a small water biscuit.
To you, Baldrick, the Renaissance was just something that happened to other people, wasn't it?
The girl is wetter than a haddock's bathing costume.
episode: Blackadder Series 3 Episode 5 – Amy and Amiability

quote: Unfortunately, most of the infantry think you're a prat. Ask them who they'd rather meet, Squadron Commander Flashheart or the man who cleans out the public toilets in Aberdeen, and they'd go for Wee Jock Poo-Pong McPlop every time.

(Blackadder is asked if he thinks Dr. Johnson is a genius) 'No sir, I do not. Unless, of course, the definition of 'genius' in his ridiculous Dictionary is "a fat dullard or wobblebottom; a pompous ass with sweaty dewflaps."'
episode: Blackadder Series 3 Episode 2 – Ink and Incapability

quote: There hasn't been a war run this badly since Olaf the hairy, King of all the Vikings, ordered 80,000 battle helmets with the horns on the inside.
(In a telegram to Charlie Chaplin) 'Congrats. Stop. Have discovered only person in world less funny than you. Stop. Name – Baldrick. Stop. PS. Please, please, please – stop.'
Baldrick, you wouldn't recognize a subtle plan if it painted itself purple and danced naked on a harpsichord singing 'subtle plans are here again'.
Baldrick, in the Amazonian rainforests there are tribes of Indians as yet untouched by civilization who have developed more convincing Charlie Chaplin impressions than yours.
I lost closer friends than 'darling Georgie' the last time I was deloused.
You're the worst cook in the entire world. There are amoebas on Saturn who can boil a better egg than you.
